title: Halaesa honours Gaius Vergilius Balbus, proquaestor
support: The stone was only seen by Muratori, and he did not provide a description

provenanceFound._: Assumed to be from Halaesa (Muratori notes that this is one of two which his own notes record at Nafplió in Greece (!), but both of which should rather be attributed to Sicily, and concludes that this should come from Halaesa).
